trends: There has been one other sighting in Green Valley
There were no other sightings in Green Valley on or around November 18th 2008
Summary: Bright flashing star low in the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsI looked south toward Green valley and was what appreared to be a very bright star flashing many colors. It was very low on the horizon. I got out my binocs (11X80) for a closer look. The object was stationary in the sky for appox 15 minutes. During the viewing, a second object of the same description and the same intensity lowers itself from the first one and hovered below it. It assended and lowered three times during the viewing. I called 911 to report it. The operator said he had heard of no other reports about t.
